Uses of Package
org.hibernate.jpa.boot.spi

  • Packages that use org.hibernate.jpa.boot.spi 
    Package Description
    org.hibernate.ejb  
    org.hibernate.ejb.packaging  
    org.hibernate.jpa
    Defines Hibernate implementation of Java Persistence specification.
    org.hibernate.jpa.boot.archive.spi
    Defines the SPI for support of "scanning" of "archives".
    org.hibernate.jpa.boot.internal  
    org.hibernate.jpa.boot.scan.spi  
    org.hibernate.jpa.boot.spi  
    org.hibernate.jpa.internal.util  
  • Classes in org.hibernate.jpa.boot.spi used by org.hibernate.ejb 
    Class and Description
    EntityManagerFactoryBuilder
    Represents a 2-phase JPA bootstrap process for building a Hibernate EntityManagerFactory.
  • Classes in org.hibernate.jpa.boot.spi used by org.hibernate.ejb.packaging 
    Class and Description
    NamedInputStream
    Deprecated. 
    Use InputStreamAccess instead.
  • Classes in org.hibernate.jpa.boot.spi used by org.hibernate.jpa 
    Class and Description
    EntityManagerFactoryBuilder
    Represents a 2-phase JPA bootstrap process for building a Hibernate EntityManagerFactory.
    PersistenceUnitDescriptor
    Abstraction for dealing with either <persistence-unit/> information whether that comes from an EE container in the form of PersistenceUnitInfo or in an SE environment where Hibernate has parsed the persistence.xml file itself.
  • Classes in org.hibernate.jpa.boot.spi used by org.hibernate.jpa.boot.archive.spi 
    Class and Description
    InputStreamAccess
    Contract for building InputStreams, especially in on-demand situations
    PersistenceUnitDescriptor
    Abstraction for dealing with either <persistence-unit/> information whether that comes from an EE container in the form of PersistenceUnitInfo or in an SE environment where Hibernate has parsed the persistence.xml file itself.

    Class and Description

    Defines the result of scanning a persistence unit for classes.

    Represents a 2-phase JPA bootstrap process for building a Hibernate EntityManagerFactory.

    Contract for building InputStreams, especially in on-demand situations
    MappingFileDescriptor

    Deprecated. 
    Use InputStreamAccess instead.
    PackageDescriptor
    Defines the result of scanning a persistence unit for packages.
    PersistenceUnitDescriptor
    Abstraction for dealing with either <persistence-unit/> information whether that comes from an EE container in the form of PersistenceUnitInfo or in an SE environment where Hibernate has parsed the persistence.xml file itself.
